purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 6th Summer School on Empirical Research Methods in Software Engineering and Informatics (ERMSEI), scheduled for September 1-5, 2025, in Rennes, France. It aims to assist junior researchers in starting empirical work in software engineering and informatics by providing practical, hands-on exercises. The summer school will cover major research methods, study design, and will focus on delivering immediate value to participants by working on their research topics. Notable speakers include Harald St√∂rrle and Djamel E. Khelladi.
